description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Australia vs South Korea in the Friendlies Women
title: Australia vs South Korea: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head
title_page: Australia vs South Korea: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt missed. Choo Hyo-Joo (Korea Republic) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Ji So-Yun.
Post
Kang Chae-Rim (Korea Republic) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Post
Fourth official has announced 5 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Kang Chae-Rim (Korea Republic) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high following a set piece situation.
Post
Attempt saved. Shin Na-Yeong (Korea Republic) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ji So-Yun with a cross.
Post
Attempt blocked. Mary Fowler (Australia) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Courtney Nevin.
Post
Attempt blocked. Kaitlyn Torpey (Australia) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Michelle Heyman.
